entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILCompiler package used in runtime without ensuring matching framework #106740
  • Runtime GC metrics should show default zero prior to first GC #106733
    9.0.0
  • Libraries build blocked by `System.TypeLoadException` #106731
  • membarrier(REGISTER_PRIVATE_EXPEDITED) waits through an unnecessary RCU grace period during Linux process startup #106722
  • [android][infra] Validate .NET 9 Android functionality across different API versions #106717
    9.0.0
  • BitOperations uses much faster binary operations to replace the DeBruijn #106736
  • GC.GetTotalMemory occasionaly returns negative values #106712
  • Source generators generate longer paths than anybody can handle #106702
  • System.Text.Json: Calling Write method of default dictionary converter from a custom dictionary converter fails with NRE #106697
  • [HttpStress] Stress builds are broken on windows #106694
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ConsoleFormatterOptions.IncludeExceptions #106692
  • [8.0] Request Backport for #91980 #106682
    8.0.x
  • Webassembly httpClient response code 0 #106689
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 8/17/2024 12:12:18 AM #106708
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 17 Regressions on 8/16/2024 4:29:39 PM #106707
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 12 Regressions on 8/15/2024 12:39:36 AM #106706
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 8/17/2024 7:43:54 PM #106710
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 8/13/2024 5:29:08 PM #106709
  • 3x perf regression on 13th Gen Intel Core (i7-13800H) maybe in System.Text.Json #106679
  • application load .net com component crash #106676
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294.cmd #106675
  • Test failure: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicConnectionTests.GetStreamCapacity_SumInvariant #106674
    10.0.0

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Object synchronization method was called from an unsynchronized block of code. #104340
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with ulong -> float conversion on arm64 #106338
    9.0.0
  • Can_Run_App_With_StatiHost installer test failure in CI #42101
    Future
  • short.Parse regression in .NET 8.0 from 7.0 #94971
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 8/13/2024 5:54:40 AM #106705
  • Test failure: "Internal consistency check failed" in System.Security.Cryptography.Dsa.Tests.DSASignVerify_Stream.InvalidKeySize_DoesNotInvalidateKey #106556
  • Test failure "RemoteExecutionException : Half-way through waiting for remote process." in System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.IOCompletionPortCountConfigVarTest #106494
  • PersistedAssemblyBuilder ILGenerator cannot handle catch block with newly created exception type #106485
    9.0.0
  • GCStress=3 `profiler/transitions/transitions/transitions.sh` is taking a really long time on Apple Silicon #50306
    Future
  • EventListenerThreadPool test failing in nativeaot outerloop runs #105556
    9.0.0
  • Add package readmes to shared framework packages #105334
  • [API Proposal]: BinaryReader.ReadExactly #101614
    10.0.0
  • Consider using memfd_create instead of shm_open in MemoryMappedFile if it's available #92905
    10.0.0
  • ICorProfilerCallback GC related behavior changed in CoreCLR 8.0? #106543
    10.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Remove HW_Flag_HasEnumOperand #105702
    10.0.0
  • NegotiateAuthentication.ComputeIntegrityCheck on Windows sets an invalid QOP #103461
    Future
  • Building System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.csproj (all TFMs) fails locally #106476
    10.0.0
  • 'chrome-GetPropertiesTests' timing out #106625
    10.0.0
  • RunCrossGen logic should not modify the test binaries #8048
  • LSRA: Consider a stress mode that trashes registers #10691
  • [mono][Perf] `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSourceLogger.NestedScopes_TwoMessages` regressions on 3/5/2024 8:17:11 PM #106462
    10.0.0
  • Native AOT Binaries still depend on libz.so #106566
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • inline b C_FUNC(JIT_WriteBarrier) #106741
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove package references from library tests #106737
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove unused custom marshaler code and move ICustomMarshaler and Color marshalling handling to managed code #106735
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Set GC metrics to zero prior to first GC #106734
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Fix infinite loop in genCreateAddrMode #106732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Grab back some performance in `RuntimeTypeHandle::GetElementType` #106730
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add callback-based Encode to AsnWriter #106728
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0] [NativeAOT] Introduce pointer-based CompareExchange intrinsic and use operating with syncblock bits. #106727
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • pal init: Init membarrier() before first thread to improve start time #106724
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix Type System Equivalence Checks #106723
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Don't copy XUnit runner to output for local builds #106721
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Cast UInt64 to Single directly during const folding #106720
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Modernize C# generation tools under coreclr/inc #106719
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Make GetObjectData for arrays use canonical method table when getting the element type #106718
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix a case in MethodImpl overriding which wasn't handled as expected in ilc.exe for native aot #106716
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc1' => 'release/9.0' #106715
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2520252 #106714
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Add NativeRuntimeEventSource metadata to NativeAot CoreLib #106713
    needs-area-label
  • Ensure that constant folding of bitwise operations for float/double are bitwise #106711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix invalid handle bug happening when `TypeBuilder` type used in exception catch clause #106704
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106701
    area-System.Numerics
  • [release/9.0] Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106700
    area-System.Numerics
  • Handle disabled algorithms on Azure Linux #106698
    area-System.Security
  • [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #106696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Stop calling morph from CSE #106695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Always call emitIns_Mov when canskip is true #106693
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid removing CSE candidates in fgMorphExpandCast #106691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Always convert to mask for mask APIs #106690
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix trimming for DiagnosticSource #106680
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [QUIC] Add synchronize for streams available callback #106678
    area-System.Net.Quic

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Update `MethodTable::IsDynamicStatics` and `DacpMethodTableData::bIsDynamic` to return 0/1 instead of flag value #106643
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Introduce pointer-based CompareExchange intrinsic and use operating with syncblock bits. #106703
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Try re-enabling some CoreCLR/NativeAOT tests #106514
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Provide System.Composition package readme #106443
    area-System.Composition, community-contribution
  • JIT: Cast UInt64 to Single directly during const folding #106419
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-rc1] Test fix: Fix IOCP count config var test #106669
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Fix getting array function type in RuntimeTypeSystem.IsArrayMethod #106512
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add NativeRuntimeEventSource metadata to NativeAot CoreLib #106641
    area-System.Threading
  • Add tests for trim warnings for marking types by name #106651
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc1' => 'release/9.0' #106649
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Fix IOCP count config var test #106664
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • Fix invalid handle bug happening when `TypeBuilder` type used in exception catch clause #106665
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [release/9.0-rc1] Include libz.a in native aot packages #106673
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix SSPI ComputeIntegrityCheck with Sign level #105605
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106506
    area-System.Runtime
  • [cdac] Remove extra [] in array type name #106662
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Rewrite profiler notify callbacks into managed #106604
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Use memfd_create when available #105178
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Implement BinaryReader.ReadExactly #106238
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Remove a workaround in targetingpacks #106681
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Build libs.tests -allconfigurations in CI #106474
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] disable trim warnings in unit tests #106623
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds test on Alpine #106635
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove RuntimeHelpers.IsReference from NativeAOT #105118
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • `__ComObject` invoke through reflection fix #106677
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Delete workaround for classic zlib #106659
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Include libz.a in native aot packages #106569
    area-System.IO.Compression

Updated

  • Fix dataflow warnings for invalid trim annotations #106672
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Use TestExclusionList in bringup_runtest.sh #106201
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update System.Net.* unit tests to react to SYSLIB0057 obsoletion #104487
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • Split dotnet/runtime-only downlevel LibraryImport support into its own source generator #106436
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 10.0.0
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Sys.RT.Caching.MemoryCache - Remove unhandled exception handler #106221
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Caching, 8.0.x
  • The mask of shift amount in `IShiftOperators<byte, int, byte>` should be 7 #103900
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [mono][mini] Interlocked.CompareExchange intrinsics for small types and enums #106660
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't keep members of pointer or byref element types #106215
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Fix Issue #105820 #106656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Use ProjectReferences in inbox src projects #106329
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 10.0.0
  • Use FeatureSwitchDefinition in a few places #106564
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NRBF] Address issues discovered by Threat Model #106629
    new-api-needs-documentation, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • add support for parallel Connect #106374
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Add Azure 3.0 helix test #106330
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix logging formatting #106367
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.10
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Type System Equivalence Checks #106667
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.10
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump versioning to .NET 10 #106421
    area-Infrastructure, 10.0.0
  • Make SafeEvpPKeyHandle.OpenKeyFromProvider throw PNSE on OSSL less than 3.0 #106397
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Disabled stackoverflow tests with largeframe for RISCV64 #106383
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Explicitly use para separators in the System.Runtime.Intrinsics XML docs #106652
    documentation, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • JIT: Improve codegen around unsigned comparisons #105593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add Non-Faulting behaviour for Sve.LoadVector*NonFaulting*() #106648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark Encoding as nullable in StreamWriter's constructor #106658
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix GenerateResolveStub #106562
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add JIT Helpers for RISCV64 #106540
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
